reviewText: I love this DVD it has many cars and i wish to buy new ones

The video actually felt really short. It's not too engaging is my guess on why some people cannot watch it in one sitting. I would have like it if they went a little more in-depth with the cars with some key people responsible for them. Even the feature cars were merely just touched upon. With that said, the video quality was excellent and the narrattion by Mike Shepherd was easy to listen to.
Picture and sound quality are excellent. Seems a little long, tried to complete watching in in two sitting and was unsuccessful.

The Tokyo Motor Show is one of the best auto shows in the world. Now with the ability to watch it anytime you want in Hi-def on Blu-Ray, you can not go wrong.

I hope future shows are released on Blu-ray.
